dialogue: You girls go ahead....
I had a word with doctor Supriya.
He won’t even charge a penny!
I thought... I thought it would make you happy.
It won’t do much good.. Last night... the builders sent a goon to my house, isn’t it?
He said he was there to give me a warning... If I didn’t leave the house by the end of the month....
My god !
You better stay at my place...its too dangerous!
Don’t worry nurse... that goon won’t show his face to me any time soon
Oh no Parvaty, what did you do?
Talk to the lawyer... it can’t go on like this.
A rice cooker?
Why would he send you that?
Are you sure it was your husband who sent it?
The box...it said it was from Germany. Who else could it be?
But when did he speak to you last?
Maybe... last year... or I think a little bit more. He called to wish me for Onam.
You know Nurse, when people live abroad for a long time, they can lose their mind or memory. It happens like that.
What are you going to do?
What should I do?
Call him up and give him a piece of your mind!
Call him?
He is very busy there... He works very hard
You work hard too isn't it?
Here taste it for the salt
If I meet that husband of yours... Im gonna box his ears, isn't it?
Did the builders come again?
No... but they cut off the electricity, isn't it!
Why didn't you tell me!?
These are all receipts and medical papers of your husband....
That’s Suresh...my son.
Good for nothing lout...drunkard, like his father, isn’t it? Its good you don’t have kids, nurse... they are more of a burden than any help.
Sorry... I didn't mean it like that.
Well.
What a dismal day.
You don’t look well.
I have not been able to sleep.
I have something for that...
Nurse, I have some news....I am moving back to my village.
There is nothing more I can do...isn’t it?
What ? Of course there is Parvaty..We can still-
I already spoke to Dr. Supriya.. and she found me a job there.
At a hospital?
No... there are some rich people who have built bungalow near by... they need a cook.
But-
At least no one can throw me out.

You see that building there... it is the same builders...They are building everywhere nurse... building their tall towers that reach up to the sky... they think they have replaced god. The construction site has many people walking around.
Its quite good, isn’t it?
I prefer your cooking.
Good, now I won’t have any regrets.
If you have regrets in this life... you have to carry them on to the next.
You only seem to be real if you have some papers... otherwise you could just vanish into thin air and no one will even know....
We would know.... If you vanished... all of us at the hospital. We will miss you.
You are a very good lady, Nurse.
I am going to do it.
You are the youngest, isn’t it!
Are you sure? I thought you loved the sea!
You can take me to the city but I won’t forget my traditional dishes.
How long will you be gone for?
The bungalow is an hour away from here. If I leave now, I can be back by 5...I only need to tell them I’m here for the job...
Anu has her mind here but her heart is somewhere else
Isn’t it so?
Its ok, call him here.
Call him...
Who is that?
Anu’s boyfriend.
She should hold on to him if he followed her this far.
Where are you from?
